name: Nexu
headline: Financing platform for LatAm car dealerships.

founders.name: Fernando Gomez Arriola, Founder
founders.description: Fernando is Co-Founder at Nexu.mx, responsible for Credit and Risk Assessment, Operations, Finance, HR and getting coffee for everyone. Fernando was born and raised in Mexico City, his childhood love for math led him to study Actuarial Sciences at ITAM and afterwards got his MBA at Wharton. Prior to starting Nexu, Fernando worked as an actuarial analyst at New York Life Insurance Company, as a Consultant at The Boston Consulting Group, and leading international growth and BizDev at Shopify.

founders.name: Abdon Nacif, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Nexu. Bolivian, Texas Longhorn, Wharton MBA.

generated_description:
### Nexu: Revolutionizing Financing for Car Dealerships in Latin America

**Company Overview**  
Nexu is a cutting-edge fintech startup based in Mexico City, Mexico, on a mission to transform the financing landscape for car dealerships across Latin America. They are an exciting player in the marketplace sector, aiming to empower dealerships by simplifying their financing processes.

**Foundation and Growth**  
Though the start date isn't specified, Nexu emerged from the renowned Y Combinator accelerator's W20 batch, which speaks volumes about its potential and innovation. With a growing team of 63 employees, the company is well-positioned to tackle the unique challenges of car financing in the region.

**Key Leadership**  
Dalton Caldwell, a notable group partner at Y Combinator, lends his expertise to Nexu, guiding them as they navigate the complex world of fintech and expanding their influence in the marketplace.

**Current Operations**  
Nexu is actively working to create a seamless experience for car dealerships, providing them with robust financing solutions that are tailored to their specific needs. Their focus on user experience is reflected in their platform, which aims to make securing financing faster and more efficient.

**Online Presence and Engagement**  
To learn more about Nexu or engage with their services, you can visit their website at [nexu.mx](https://www.nexu.mx/). They also maintain a presence on various social media platforms, including [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/nexumx), [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/3786853), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nexu.mx/), and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nexumx) — a good way to stay updated on their latest developments.

**Conclusion**  
As a fintech entity in a rapidly growing sector, Nexu stands out for its commitment to enhancing the operations of car dealerships in Latin America. With Y Combinator backing and a dynamic team, they’re set to make a significant impact on how dealerships approach financing, paving the way for a more streamlined and efficient automotive market.

---

For further details, feel free to check out their website and explore their offerings:
- **Work with Us**: [Trabaja con Nosotros](https://www.nexu.mx/<https:/nexu.breezy.hr/>)
- **Privacy Notice**: [Aviso de Privacidad](https://www.nexu.mx/</aviso_de_privacidad>)
- **Terms and Conditions**: [Términos y Condiciones](https://www.nexu.mx/</terminos_y_condiciones>)
- **Blog**: [Get insights](https://www.nexu.mx/<http:/www.nexu.mx/blog>)

Keep an eye on Nexu; they’re just getting started!
